sections.description: Maintain custom order number format for WooCommerce.
sections.installation: Click the activate button and that's it.
sections.changelog:
v1.1.0 released on December 20, 2024

  • Bugfix: Corrected issue with user ID sequence.
  • Improvement: Enhanced performance for large databases.

v1.0.0 released on October 16, 2024

  • Initial release of WooCommerce Custom number. Ability to customize and use custom order numbers for WooCommerce.
  • Feature: Customizable order number format.
  • Feature: Utilities for custom number regeneration and reset.
